attributes.action: create a british-space-agency similar to N.A.S.A.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to get in to outer space and fast as we are killing off this planet. At least if we had a space agency we could reap the benefits of the driving power of some of this country's top scientists to find a new place to live. Even if it is just the moon or mars. Why not call it B-A-S-E (British Agency for Space Exploration)as we need to start at the B-A-S-E considering were behind every other country that does have a space agency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
